commit message: Queue actions on the todo.txt file. Possible fix for #266
Fix an issue with logging out
Fix build for cloudless after #266 changes
Switched logging to logback for Android
Use rolling file appender instead of db
Don't use back for recent navigation. This makes the default todo less of an issue #255
Only clear todolist if reload is succesful
Cleanup: Don't mix Nullable annotations, use logback everywhere, optimize imports
Fixed some compilation issues caused by cleanup
Designing APIs is an Art :( thanks google
Fix menu handling after closing selectionmode
Don't crash if history is empty
Don't reload dropbox revision we already have
Use rec:+ to mean recur from original date instead of a setting. Fixes #29
Make intial todo list loading synchrounous. Possible fix for #266
Save from the TodoList not from the app callback
Only archive after the tasks are completed
Revert sync initial load fix for #266 as it doesn't work for Dropbox
Create initial empty todo.txt on dropbox. Fixes #271
No need to show logger in LogCatAppender
Don't dismiss the dialog if it's not showing
Retain left drawer scroll position after click
Don't show UI when adding background task
